comments.body: I know we do the same for the `StickyTaskAssignor`, but I don't really see what we gain by adding an interface for this class. Do we need it?

The idea was to enable the strategy design pattern. It makes the whole assignment algorithm more modular. The algorithm implementation can be plugged in easily and if we want we can even choose the algorithm at runtime which can be handy if we want to benchmark different versions of the algorithm.

Actually, we do not need it. I just add it because I thought it would make the code more readable, but the improvement was not that big. You can remove it when you copy over this code to the other PR.
